item.title: 芯片股拖累期指下跌，美联储利率决议拭目以待
item.description: 美国股指期货周三下跌，原因是低迷的业绩拖累了芯片类股票，而且市场在当天晚些时候更多经济数据和美联储利率决定公布前保持谨慎。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Wednesday as downbeat results dragged chip stocks and markets exercised caution ahead of more economic data and the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision later in the day.】

item.title: 早间竞价：2024 年美联储减息希望渺茫，债券五月天
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 更多美联储官员准备告别低利率世界
item.description: 越来越多的美联储官员认为，从不断膨胀的联邦赤字到对绿色能源、人工智能和国内制造业的投资需求等各种因素来看，COVID-19 大流行之前的超低利率不会重现。【原文：A growing number of Federal Reserve officials don't see a return to the ultra-low interest rates that prevailed before the COVID-19 pandemic due to everything from ballooning federal deficits to demand for investments in green energy, artificial intelligence and domestic manufacturing.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，花旗集团在加强气候行动过程中贷款受到冲击
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一份由美国花旗银行编写的机密分析报告称，如果世界各国加快应对气候变化的步伐，花旗集团的贷款可能会遭受数十亿美元的损失。【原文：Citigroup could suffer billions of dollars of losses in its loan book if the world sped up efforts to tackle climate change, according to a confidential analysis prepared by the U.S. bank that was reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称福特召回 242,669 辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周三表示，福特将召回242,669辆2022-2024年款Maverick汽车，原因是后尾灯无法点亮，导致车辆能见度降低。【原文：Ford is recalling 242,669 units of its 2022-2024 Maverick vehicles over the failure of rear tail lights to illuminate, causing it to reduce the vehicle's visibility, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 投资者拭目以待托运人第一季度数据中的 "红海 "部分
item.description: 欧洲航运公司马士基（Maersk）和赫伯罗特（Hapag-Lloyd）在第一季度不太可能从红海危机导致的运费飙升中获得巨大收益，这加剧了人们对长期运力过剩的担忧。【原文：European shipping firms Maersk and Hapag-Lloyd are unlikely to get a big boost from soaring freight rates due to the Red Sea crisis in the first quarter, reinforcing worries about overcapacity in the long run.】

item.title: 美联储政策决议前美元接近五个月高点
item.description: 周三，美元兑一篮子同业货币升至今年以来的最高水平，美国股指期货在美联储政策决定公布前下跌，但由于许多欧洲和亚洲市场休市，市场交投清淡。【原文：The dollar edged towards its highest level this year against a basket of peers and U.S. share futures dipped on Wednesday ahead of a Federal Reserve policy decision, though trading was thin with many European and Asian markets closed.】

item.title: 美联储前数据冲击后美元接近年内高点，日元下滑
item.description: 周二的数据显示，有更多迹象表明美国经济面临通胀压力，在美联储当天晚些时候做出利率决定之前，美元汇率在周三升至11月以来的最高水平。【原文：The dollar inched towards its highest level since November on Wednesday ahead of a Federal Reserve interest rate decision later in the day, after data on Tuesday showed more signs of inflationary pressure in the U.S. economy.】

item.title: 比特币跌破58,000美元，美联储利率前景更加严峻令其惶恐不安
item.description: 在美联储稍后做出利率决定和美国劳动力市场关键数据公布之前，比特币周三连续第三天下跌，4月份的月度表现为2022年底以来最差。【原文：Bitcoin fell for a third day on Wednesday, having posted its worst monthly performance in April since late 2022, ahead of an interest rate decision by the Federal Reserve later and key U.S. labour market data.】

item.title: Haleon 第一季度收入不及预期
item.description: 消费保健品公司海伦（Haleon）周三公布的第一季度营收不及市场预期，原因是美国零售商去库存化，以及感冒药需求在去年激增后出现降温。【原文：Consumer healthcare company Haleon's first-quarter revenue missed market estimates on Wednesday, due to retailer destocking in the U.S., and a cool down in demand for cold and flu medication after a surge last year.】

item.title: 华为备受瞩目的消费者业务主管余承东转变角色
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，中国华为技术公司（HWT.UL）已任命备受瞩目的消费者业务主管余承东担任该部门董事长。【原文：China's Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) has named the high-profile chief of its consumer business, Yu Chengdong, to a new role chairing the unit, a person with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 英国多米诺比萨公司第二季度增长缓慢
item.description: 英国多米诺比萨集团（Domino's Pizza Group）周三表示，在第一季度销售额下滑和订单减少之后，第二季度由于比较期的增长而开始放缓。【原文：Britain's Domino's Pizza Group said on Wednesday the second quarter started off slower due to a stronger comparative period after it reported a dip in sales and lower orders in the first quarter.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁季度亏损超预期
item.description: 英国豪华汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）周三公布的第一季度税前亏损超过预期，原因是财务成本上升和汽车上市时间推迟。【原文：British luxury carmaker Aston Martin posted a bigger-than-expected first-quarter pretax loss on Wednesday due to higher finance costs and the timings of its car launches.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克上调全年利润预期，称上半年销售将更强劲
item.description: 葛兰素史克周三上调了全年利润预期，并表示由于对普通呼吸道病毒疫苗和带状疱疹疫苗的需求强劲，今年前六个月的销售额将高于下半年。【原文：GSK raised its full-year profit forecast on Wednesday and said its sales would be higher in the first six months of the year than the second half on the back of strong demand for its common respiratory virus and shingles vaccines.】

item.title: 第一季度销售额增长后，英国 Next 保持盈利指引
item.description: 英国服装零售商 Next 周三公布第一季度全价销售额增长 5.7%，略高于预期，维持了对全年利润的预期。【原文：British clothing retailer Next on Wednesday kept its forecast for annual profit after reporting a 5.7% rise in first-quarter full-price sales that was slightly ahead of its guidance.】

item.title: 日元暴跌淹没了日本央行的鹰派声音
item.description: 日本央行上周维持政策不变的决定给日元看跌者提供了大量卖出线索，但在这股热潮中，央行可能在未来几年分几个阶段加息，并可能在秋季加息的信号在很大程度上被忽略了。【原文：The Bank of Japan's decision to keep policy unchanged last week gave yen bears plenty of sell cues, but largely overlooked in the stampede were signals the central bank could raise rates in several stages in years ahead, with a hike possible in autumn.】

item.title: 华尔街震荡之际，投资者在全球各地寻找避难所
item.description: 由于顽固的通胀导致对美联储降息时间的押注被修正，全球投资者都在关注欧洲和新兴市场资产，以保护自己免受美国股市和债券进一步动荡的影响。【原文：Global investors are eyeing European and emerging market assets to protect themselves from further turbulence in U.S. stocks and bonds as stubborn inflation causes bets on the timing of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts to be revised.】

item.title: 美联储将维持利率稳定，因通胀削弱了放松政策的希望
item.description: 美国央行官员将于周三结束为期两天的最新政策会议，届时美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）将发表新的声明和评论，这可能会让人更清楚地了解最近令人失望的通胀数据如何改变了今年降息的预期。【原文：U.S. central bank officials will conclude their latest two-day policy meeting on Wednesday with a new statement and comments from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell that could give a clearer sense of how recent disappointing inflation readings have changed the expectation for interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 美国在伦敦房地产上的支出反弹至八年来最高水平
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas）房地产部门编制的数据显示，受英国市场复苏速度快于美国的迹象吸引，美国投资者正以八年来最快的速度购买伦敦的商业地产。【原文：U.S. investors are buying up London commercial property at the fastest rate in eight years, data compiled by BNP Paribas's real estate arm showed, lured by signs the market in Britain is recovering faster than the harder-hit United States.】

item.title: 早间竞标：美联储日关注周杰伦的言论
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 微软将在泰国开设首个地区数据中心
item.description: 科技巨头微软周三表示，将在泰国开设首个地区数据中心，以扩大云服务的可用性。【原文：Microsoft will open its first regional data centre in Thailand, the tech giant said on Wednesday, as it looks to widen availability of cloud services.】

item.title: 美国原油库存增加，石油连续第三天下跌
item.description: 由于全球最大的石油消费国美国的原油库存和产量上升，加上中东地区达成停火协议的希望越来越大，油价周三连续第三天下跌。【原文：Oil prices fell for a third day on Wednesday on rising crude inventories and production in the U.S., the world's biggest oil consumer, along with increasing hopes of a ceasefire agreement in the Middle East.】

item.title: 澳大利亚航空公司调查忠诚度应用程序数据泄露报告
item.description: 澳大利亚澳洲航空公司（Qantas Airways）周三表示，该公司正在调查影响其飞行常客应用程序的问题，此前有媒体报道称，该公司存在数据泄露问题，允许用户访问其他乘客的旅行信息。【原文：Australia's Qantas Airways said on Wednesday it was investigating issues impacting its frequent flyer application, after media reports suggested there was a data breach allowing users access to other passengers' travel information.】

item.title: 成本上升、抵押贷款竞争激烈，澳大利亚银行利润面临挤压
item.description: 由于运营成本居高不下，加上抵押贷款和存款销售竞争激烈，利润空间受到挤压，澳大利亚最大的银行很可能会公布上半年利润下降的报告，这可能会扭转分析师认为该行业已经过热的股价涨势。【原文：Australia's biggest banks are likely to report weaker first-half profit as high operating costs and competition to sell mortgages and deposits squeeze margins, setting up a possible reversal of a stock rally that analysts said has left the sector overheated.】

item.title: PMI显示日本工厂活动下降缓慢
item.description: 周三进行的一项私营部门调查显示，由于产出和新订单的降幅放缓，日本 4 月份的工厂活动萎缩速度有所放缓。【原文：Japan's factory activity shrank at a slower pace in April as declines in output and new orders eased, a private-sector survey showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国参议院批准禁止进口俄罗斯铀的法案
item.description: 美国参议院周二批准了禁止进口俄罗斯铀的立法，因为美国继续寻求破坏俄罗斯在对乌克兰战争中的努力。【原文：The U.S. Senate approved on Tuesday legislation to bar imports of Russian uranium, as the United States continues to seek to disrupt Russia's efforts in its war against Ukraine.】

item.title: 人工智能推动科技巨头云计算蓬勃发展
item.description: 最近几天，华尔街三家重量级科技公司公布的云计算部门销售额均好于预期，原因是对人工智能的兴趣推动了企业客户支出的反弹。【原文：Three of the Wall Street's heavyweight technology firms have reported better-than-expected sales at their cloud computing units in recent days, as interest in artificial intelligence drives a rebound in spending by corporate customers.】

item.title: 消息人士称，邮轮运营商维京的首次公开募股价格在15.4亿美元的范围内
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，邮轮运营商维京控股公司周二将其首次公开募股定价定在了每股 24 美元的目标范围内。【原文：Cruise operator Viking Holdings priced its initial public offering within its targeted range at $24 per share on Tuesday, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比特币耶稣 "因美国逃税指控在西班牙被捕
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，一名被称为 "比特币耶稣 "的比特币早期投资者在西班牙被捕，美国指控他逃税至少 4800 万美元。【原文：An early investor in bitcoins dubbed the "Bitcoin Jesus" has been arrested in Spain on U.S. charges that he evaded paying at least $48 million in taxes, the U.S. Department of Justice said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 解说员：美国对大麻的改变将如何帮助大麻公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国司法部正着手将吸食大麻定为不那么严重的联邦罪行，建议将大麻重新归类为与含可待因的泰诺类似的药物，而不是海洛因。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department is moving to make marijuana use a less serious federal crime with a proposal to reclassify the drug as on par with Tylenol with codeine, rather than heroin, according to sources.】
